definition: gun/firearm/rifle/spear/thing with shape or function similar to a gun/CL:支[zhi1],把[ba3],桿|杆[gan3],條|条[tiao2],枝[zhi1]/to substitute for another person in a test/to knock/classifier for rifle shots
France/French/abbr. for 法國|法国[Fa3 guo2]/Taiwan pr. [Fa4]
law/method/way/to emulate/(Buddhism) dharma/(abbr. for 法家[Fa3 jia1]) the Legalists/(physics) farad (abbr. for 法拉[fa3 la1])

sentences.english: Today, to the point of interest, to talk about your marksmanship.
sentences.chinese: 今天來了點興趣，就來談談槍法吧。

sentences.english: He was daringand resourceful besides being a fine shot.
sentences.chinese: 他不只是槍法好，而且還機智勇敢。

sentences.english: The sniper shoots so exactly that no one can escape his shots.
sentences.chinese: 這名狙擊手的槍法很準，沒人能逃過他的狙擊。

sentences.english: I know how to shoot and I shoot well.
sentences.chinese: 我知道怎樣射擊，並且我槍法很準。

sentences.english: Leaf-disc method and microprojectile bombardment were adopted for gene transformation.
sentences.chinese: 轉化方法以葉盤法爲主，輔助使用了基因槍法。

sentences.english: Old stone young and Luo Daquan compare marksmanship, equal.
sentences.chinese: 陳石仔和羅大全比槍法，不相上下。

sentences.english: Thirty seconds later someone shot both of them. With incredible accuracy.
sentences.chinese: 30秒後有人像他們開槍，槍法準的出奇。

sentences.english: When playing across the line of fire marksmanship training from the beginning of what?
sentences.chinese: 在玩穿越火線時練槍法是從什麼開始？

sentences.english: Huang feng see this dumb bean marksmanship really good, then take dumb beans.
sentences.chinese: 黃鳴鋒見這個啞豆槍法確實不錯，便收下啞豆。

sentences.english: By the way, your marksmanship is quasi -.
Why are all the subconscious mercenaries such bad shots?
sentences.chinese: 爲什麼所有潛意識裏的防禦者都槍法都這麼爛？

definition: (respectful for) one's grandfather/sb's father/older people/the head of the house (used by servants)/a district magistrate
to view death as a return home/to not be afraid of dying/to face death with equanimity (idiom)
Sun Wukong 孫悟空|孙悟空[Sun1 Wu4 kong1], the Monkey King, character with supernatural powers in the novel Journey to the West 西遊記|西游记[Xi1 you2 Ji4]
Yama, King of Hell/translation of Sanskrit: Yama Raja
